TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICollectionView implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged
Public Interface ICollectionView Implements IEnumerable, INotifyCollectionChanged

summary.span: 讓集合擁有目前記錄管理、自訂排序、篩選和分組的功能。

span.span: Enables collections to have the functionalities of current record management, custom sorting, filtering, and grouping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面由實作類別，這是基底類別的， ，和。The interface is implemented by the class, which is the base class for , , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會假設項目是否屬於基礎集合。This method does not make any assumptions about whether the item belongs to the underlying collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ Culture { System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ get(); void set(System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定文化資訊，描述此檢視依文化特性而異的任何作業，例如排序。

span.span: Gets or sets the cultural info for any operations of the view that may differ by culture, such as sorting.

value.span: 要在排序期間使用的文化特性。

span.span: The culture to use during sorting.

summary.span: 實作這個介面時，在變更目前項目之後會引發這個事件。

span.span: When implementing this interface, raise this event after the current item has been changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會實作這個介面的類別應該引發事件，並查看屬性值變更為貨幣，並引發之前事件。Classes that are implementing this interface should raise the event and check the property value before changing the currency and raising event.

span.span: When implementing this interface, raise this event before changing the current item.
